elements.name: p
elements.content: Founded by Vikram, Agnes and Hall of Fame Chef Manmohan Singh, Kama brings generations of Indian culinary artistry to life with fresh, globally inspired dishes and unforgettable hospitality.

elements.name: h2
elements.content: Experience The Flavours of Tradition & Innovation

elements.name: p
elements.content: At Kama, we mix classic flavors with a modern twist to bring you food that’s full of heart and soul. Whether you’re dining in, grabbing takeout, or planning a get-together, we’re here to make it delicious. From our kitchen to your table, every bite’s a little journey. Come see why people love us at any of our three locations!

elements.name: p
elements.content: Host your special occasion in style at Kama Bistro, where refined flavors and thoughtful hospitality create a truly memorable experience. From milestone celebrations and anniversaries to corporate gatherings and team dinners, our venue offers a sophisticated setting for every event.

elements.name: p
elements.content: Choose from our intimate dining spaces or opt for a full-venue buyout to elevate your celebration. At Kama Bistro, every detail is carefully curated to ensure your event is as flavorful as it is seamless.

elements.name: a
elements.aria: Go to the inquiry form page

elements.name: h2
elements.content: Why Choose Kama for  Private Events?

elements.name: p
elements.content: At Kama Bistro, we turn special occasions into unforgettable experiences. Our venues in Wicker Park and La Grange offer a warm, elegant atmosphere perfect for both intimate dinners and full-venue celebrations.

elements.name: p
elements.content: We specialize in crafting bold, flavorful menus that blend tradition with modern flair—customized to suit your event. From start to finish, our experienced team takes care of every detail, offering full-service coordination, curated food and drink options, and attentive hospitality.

elements.name: p
elements.content: Whether you're celebrating a milestone or hosting a business event, Kama Bistro provides the setting, service, and cuisine to make it truly exceptional.

elements.name: p
elements.content: Enjoy the signature dishes that define Kama — thoughtfully crafted and loved by guests at both our locations. From bold and aromatic North Indian flavors to globally inspired comfort food, each dish is a perfect balance of tradition and creativity. These all-time favorites reflect our passion for great taste and keep our guests coming back for more.

elements.name: p
elements.content: Tender, smoky ribs glazed with a bold Indian-inspired BBQ sauce.

elements.name: p
elements.content: Enjoy bold, authentic flavors - your perfect afternoon escape.

elements.name: p
elements.content: Wholesome toast with spinach, avacado, and soft-boiled eggs

elements.name: p
elements.content: Kama Bistro brings bold, elevated Indian flavors tailored to your event. Whether you're planning a private dinner, corporate function, or grand celebration, our catering team curates custom menus designed to impress

elements.name: p
elements.content: Expect restaurant-quality dishes, refined presentation, and professional service—on-site or at your selected venue. From signature small plates to full-course meals, every detail reflects Kama's commitment to flavor and excellence.

elements.name: a
elements.aria: Go to the inquiry form page

elements.name: p
elements.content: Kama Bistro brings the rich flavors of modern Indian cuisine to your event with precision and flair. Our catering service blends culinary creativity with professional execution, ensuring every dish is thoughtfully crafted and beautifully presented.From intimate gatherings to large-scale functions, we offer:

elements.name: p
elements.content: tailored to your preferences and dietary needs
